titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the income limitation applicable to heads of household for purposes of the Hope and Lifetime Learning credits and the interest deduction on education loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/7/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to Hope and Lifetime Learning credits and the interest deduction on education loans, to increase the income limitations for heads of households.
